outline:
1. to circumcise, let oneself be circumcised, cut, be cut off
    1. (Qal) to circumcise
    2. (Niphal) to be circumcised, circumcise oneself
    3. (Hiphil) to cause to be circumcised
      1. of destruction (fig.)
    4. (Hithpolel) to be cut off
    5. (Polel) cut down
kjv_def: circumcise(-ing), selves), cut down (in pieces), destroy, [idiom] must needs.
strongs_def: to cut short, i.e. curtail (specifically the prepuce, i.e. to circumcise); by implication, to blunt; figuratively, to destroy
